```{r setup}
library(netmediate)

data(addhealth, package = "netmediate")

graph <- addhealth[[36]]
graph

A <- igraph::as_adjacency_matrix(graph)
```

```{r}
library(gdim)

cv_eigs <- eigcv(A, k_max = 250)
```

```{r}
cv_eigs
plot(cv_eigs)
```

```{r}
nodelm_robust(graph = graph)
```
